ai-sn19:1.1.2_0: At one time the Buddha was staying near Rājagaha, in the Bamboo Grove, the squirrels’ feeding ground.
ai-sn19:1.1.3_0: while Venerable Lakkhaṇa and Venerable Mahāmoggallāna were staying on the Vulture Peak.
ai-sn19:1.1.4_0: Then Mahāmoggallāna robed up in the morning and, taking his bowl and robe, went to Lakkhaṇa and
ai-sn19:1.1.4_1: and after going, he said this to venerable Lakkhaṇa:
ai-sn19:1.1.5_0: “Come, Reverend Lakkhaṇa, let’s enter Rājagaha for alms.”
ai-sn19:1.1.7_0: As they were descending from the Vulture Peak, Mahāmoggallāna smiled at a certain place.
ai-sn19:1.1.10_0: “Reverend Lakkhaṇa, it’s the wrong time for this question.
ai-sn19:1.1.11_0: Ask me when we’re in the Buddha’s presence.”
ai-sn19:1.2.1_0: Then, after their meal and after returning from almsround, Lakkhaṇa and Mahāmoggallāna approached the Buddha
ai-sn19:1.2.1_1: After bowing down to the Buddha, they sat down,
ai-sn19:1.2.1_2: After the meal, on their return from alms-round, they went to the Buddha, bowed, and sat down to one side. Lakkhaṇa said to Mahāmoggallāna:
ai-sn19:1.2.2_0: “Just now, as Mahāmoggallāna was descending from Vulture’s Peak Mountain he smiled at a certain spot.
ai-sn19:1.3.1_0: “Just now, reverend, as I was descending from Vulture’s Peak Mountain I saw a skeleton flying through the air.
ai-sn19:1.3.2_0: Vultures, crows, and hawks kept chasing it, pecking and clawing
ai-sn19:1.3.4_0: Then this, friend, occurred to me:
ai-sn19:1.3.6_0: That there can be such a sentient being,
ai-sn19:1.4.1_0: Then the Buddha addressed the mendicants:
ai-sn19:1.4.3_0: since a disciple knows, sees, and witnesses such a thing.
ai-sn19:1.4.4_0: Formerly, I too saw that being, but I did not speak of it.
ai-sn19:1.4.5_0: If I had, others wouldn’t have believed me,
ai-sn19:1.4.6_0: and that would have been for their harm and suffering for a long time.
ai-sn19:1.4.7_0: That being used to be a cattle butcher right here in Rājagaha.
ai-sn19:1.4.8_0: As a result of his deeds, he was tormented in hell for many years, for many hundreds of years, for many thousands of years. And now, because of the remaining result of his actions, he’s experiencing such an existence.”
ai-sn19:1.4.9_0: (All these discourses should be expanded like this.)
ai-sn19:2.1.1_0: “Just now, reverend, as I was descending from Vulture’s Peak Mountain I saw a lump of meat flying through the air.
ai-sn19:2.1.2_0: Vultures, crows, and hawks kept chasing it, pecking and clawing
ai-sn19:2.1.4_0: “That being used to be a cattle butcher right here in Rājagaha. ...”
ai-sn19:3.1.1_0: “Just now, reverend, as I was descending from Vulture’s Peak Mountain I saw a piece of flesh flying through the air.
ai-sn19:3.1.2_0: Vultures, crows, and hawks kept chasing it, pecking and clawing
ai-sn19:3.1.4_0: “That being used to be a bird hunter right here in Rājagaha. ...”
ai-sn19:4.1.1_0: “Just now, reverend, as I was descending from Vulture’s Peak Mountain I saw a flayed man flying through the air.
ai-sn19:4.1.2_0: Vultures, crows, and hawks kept chasing it, pecking and clawing
ai-sn19:4.1.3_0: while it uttered cries of distress. ...” ...
ai-sn19:4.1.4_0: “That being used to be a sheep butcher right here in Rājagaha. ...”
ai-sn19:5.1.1_0: “Just now, reverend, as I was descending from Vulture’s Peak Mountain I saw a man whose body hairs were swords flying through the air.
ai-sn19:5.1.2_0: And those swords kept rising up and falling on his body
ai-sn19:5.1.3_0: while it uttered cries of distress. ...” ...
ai-sn19:5.1.4_0: “That being used to be a pig butcher right here in Rājagaha. ...”
ai-sn19:6.1.1_0: “Just now, reverend, as I was descending from Vulture’s Peak Mountain I saw a man whose body hairs were spears flying through the air.
ai-sn19:6.1.2_0: And those spears kept rising up and falling on his body
ai-sn19:6.1.3_0: while it uttered cries of distress. ...” ...
ai-sn19:6.1.4_0: “That being used to be a deer hunter right here in Rājagaha. ...”
ai-sn19:6.1.5_0: The sixth offering to an individual.
ai-sn19:7.1.1_0: “As I was coming down from the Vulture Peak, I saw a man with body hairs of arrows flying through the air.
ai-sn19:7.1.2_0: Again and again he was pierced by those arrows,
ai-sn19:7.1.3_0: while it uttered cries of distress. ...” ...
ai-sn19:7.1.4_0: “That being used to be a torturer right here in Rājagaha. ...”
ai-sn19:8.1.1_0: “Just now, reverend, as I was descending from Vulture’s Peak Mountain I saw a man whose body hairs were needles flying through the air.
ai-sn19:8.1.2_0: And those needles kept rising up and falling on his body
ai-sn19:8.1.3_0: while it uttered cries of distress. ...” ...
ai-sn19:8.1.4_0: “That being used to be an informant right here in Rājagaha. ...”
ai-sn19:9.1.1_0: “Just now, reverend, as I was descending from Vulture’s Peak Mountain I saw a man whose body hairs were needles flying through the air.
ai-sn19:9.1.2_0: Those needles pierced his head and came out through his mouth,
ai-sn19:9.1.3_0: entered his mouth and came out through his breast,
ai-sn19:9.1.4_0: into his chest and out his belly,
ai-sn19:9.1.5_0: into his belly and out his thighs,
ai-sn19:9.1.6_0: into his thighs and out his calves,
ai-sn19:9.1.7_0: and into his calves and out his feet.
ai-sn19:9.1.8_0: while it uttered cries of distress. ...” ...
ai-sn19:9.1.9_0: “That being used to be an informant right here in Rājagaha. ...”
ai-sn19:10.1.1_0: “Just now, reverend, as I was descending from Vulture’s Peak Mountain I saw a man with testicles as big as pots flying through the air.
ai-sn19:10.1.2_0: When he was walking he had to lift his testicles on to his shoulder.
ai-sn19:10.1.3_0: and when he sat down, he sat on top of his testicles.
ai-sn19:10.1.4_0: Vultures, crows, and hawks kept chasing it, pecking and clawing
ai-sn19:10.1.5_0: while it uttered cries of distress. ...” ...
ai-sn19:10.1.6_0: “That being used to be a corrupt official right here in Rājagaha. ...”
ai-sn19:10.2.3_0: Sūraka, who was a pig-butcher and knife,
ai-sn19:10.2.4_0: a torturer and arrow, a horse trainer and needle.
ai-sn19:10.2.6_0: A corrupt magistrate had testicles as burden;
ai-sn19:11.1.2_0: At one time near Rājagaha in the Bamboo Grove ...
ai-sn19:11.1.3_0: “As I was coming down from the Vulture Peak, I saw a man sunk over his head in a cesspit ...”
ai-sn19:11.1.4_0: “... That being, monks, was an adulterer in this very Rājagaha. ...”
ai-sn19:12.1.1_0: “Just now, reverend, as I was descending from Vulture’s Peak Mountain I saw a man sunk to over his handsmeared with both hands ...”
ai-sn19:12.1.2_0: “That being used to be a nasty brahmin right here in Rājagaha.
ai-sn19:12.1.3_0: In the time of the Buddha Kassapa’s dispensation he invited the Saṅgha of mendicants for a meal. He filled a trough with dung and said:
ai-sn19:12.1.4_0: ‘My good men, eat as much as you like, and take what’s left.’ ...”
ai-sn19:13.1.1_0: “Just now, reverend, as I was descending from Vulture’s Peak Mountain I saw a flayed woman flying through the air.
ai-sn19:13.1.2_0: Vultures, crows, and hawks kept chasing it, pecking and clawing
ai-sn19:13.1.4_0: “That woman used to be an adulteress right here in Rājagaha. ...”
ai-sn19:14.1.1_0: “Just now, reverend, as I was descending from Vulture’s Peak Mountain I saw a stinking fishwife flying through the air.
ai-sn19:14.1.2_0: Vultures, crows, and hawks kept chasing it, pecking and clawing
ai-sn19:14.1.4_0: “That woman used to be a fortune-teller right here in Rājagaha. ...”
ai-sn19:15.1.1_0: “Just now, reverend, as I was descending from Vulture’s Peak Mountain I saw a scorched woman, sooty and sweaty, flying through the air,
ai-sn19:15.1.3_0: “That woman used to be the king of Kaliṅga’s chief queen.
ai-sn19:15.1.4_0: She was of jealous nature, and poured a brazier of hot coals over her co-wife. ...” ...
ai-sn19:16.1.1_0: “Just now, reverend, as I was descending from Vulture’s Peak Mountain I saw a headless trunk flying through the air.
ai-sn19:16.1.2_0: with eyes and mouth on its chest.
ai-sn19:16.1.3_0: Vultures, crows, and hawks kept chasing it, pecking and clawing
ai-sn19:16.1.4_0: while it uttered cries of distress. ...” ...
ai-sn19:16.1.5_0: “That being used to be an executioner called Hārika right here in Rājagaha. ...”
ai-sn19:16.1.6_0: The sixth offering to an individual.
ai-sn19:17.1.1_0: “Just now, reverend, as I was descending from Vulture’s Peak Mountain I saw a monk flying through the air.
ai-sn19:17.1.2_0: His outer robe, bowl, belt, and body were burning, blazing, and glowing
ai-sn19:17.1.3_0: while it uttered cries of distress. ...” ...
ai-sn19:17.1.4_0: “... During the time of the Buddha Kassapa’s dispensation, that monk was a bad monk.” ...
ai-sn19:18.1.1_0: “I saw a nun flying through the air.
ai-sn19:18.1.3_0: “She used to be a bad nun ...”
ai-sn19:19.1.1_0: “I saw a trainee nun flying through the air.
ai-sn19:19.1.3_0: “She used to be a bad trainee nun ...”
ai-sn19:20.1.1_0: “I saw a novice monk flying through the air.
ai-sn19:21.1.1_0: “Just now, reverend, as I was descending from Vulture’s Peak Mountain I saw a novice nun flying through the air.
ai-sn19:21.1.4_0: Then this, friend, occurred to me:
ai-sn19:21.1.6_0: That there can be such a sentient being,
ai-sn19:21.2.1_0: Then the Buddha addressed the mendicants:
ai-sn19:21.2.3_0: since a disciple knows, sees, and witnesses such a thing.
ai-sn19:21.2.4_0: I too, monks, have seen that novice nun,
ai-sn19:21.2.5_0: but I didn’t speak about it.
ai-sn19:21.2.6_0: If I had, others wouldn’t have believed me,
ai-sn19:21.2.7_0: and that would have been for their harm and suffering for a long time.
ai-sn19:21.2.8_0: That female novice used to be a bad novice nun in the time of the Buddha Kassapa’s dispensation.
ai-sn19:21.2.9_0: As a result of her deeds, she was tormented in hell for many years, for many hundreds of years, for many thousands of years. And now, because of the remaining result of her actions, she’s experiencing such an existence.”
ai-sn19:21.3.1_0: An adulterer submerged in a pit,
ai-sn19:21.3.2_0: An eater of feces was a wicked brahmin.
ai-sn19:21.3.4_0: An ugly woman was a fortune-teller;
ai-sn19:21.3.5_0: A sweating woman scattered coals on a co-wife,
ai-sn19:21.3.6_0: A beheaded man was an executioner.
ai-sn19:21.4.1_0: A monk, a nun, a trainee nun,
ai-sn19:21.4.2_0: A novice monk, then a novice nun;
ai-sn19:21.4.3_0: These having gone forth in the training of Kassapa
ai-sn19:21.4.4_0: they did bad deeds right there.
ai-sn19:21.4.5_0: The Linked Discourses with Lakkhaṇa are complete.
